game.name: Star Ripper
game.description:
Your favourite character Star Ripper needs your help on an urgent basis. He has been locked in the space station and no one is there to guide him. Would you take the responsibility of showing him the path to escape? Join Star Ripper and be prepared to control him through the corridors that are full of deadly obstacles! He is alone and got confused where to find out the way to escape. Make him run until he reaches his destination!
Do not forget to break the boxes that you see along the way in this latest action-packed challenge. You also need to focus on grabbing the bonuses to boost your score. Challenge your quick reflexes and running skills to clear multiple levels. The more boxes you will break and maximum number of bonuses you collect the higher your score will be in the end. Keep your eyes on the protective suit and get it immediately to extend your life!
Grab your missiles to destroy your military guns in this HTML5 highly addictive running game! Use the left and right key to make him run, jump using the up arrow key and crash the enemy object or other enemy with the help of down arrow! You can browse through our extensive variety of free action games to keep you engrossed for some hours, even for days and months without download. All games available on our website feature high quality colourful graphics, simple controls and addictive gameplay.
